name: No Omelette Today!
description:
Roll the dice and do your best to place the random chicky volunteers and defend the coop in this tower defense action game. Keep the foxes away and they'll have No Omelette Today!

Hints:
- For the best experience, full screen is recommended.
- Use the mouse to select chickens from the sidebar and place them where they can attack the foxes.
- Some chickens don't directly attack, but instead buff existing chickens. Good placement is key to beating the waves!
- Scoring 400 points is good, 800 is excellent. Can you reach 1k?

Built in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.
